metadata.synopsis: A goblin guard reacts to an explosion triggered when a player tries to open a rigged cage.

1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Zami
1.text: Tnak! Almost got hit by giblets! Glad we rigged that up, eh?
1.context: NodeContext: Tnak is a goblin curse - similar to 'damn!' Pronounced tuh-NACK. An explosion just went off nearby, killing a captive (the source of the giblets). Amused and surprised rather than shocked, with a laugh after or on 'giblets' pleased the trap they 'rigged' worked.

0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Zami
0.text: I ain't cleanin' up that mess though.
0.context: NodeContext: looking at the gory aftermath of an explosive trap - passing the buck on cleaning up the guts
